original_text: Instead, Moses chose to join with God's people. He chose to receive trouble and pain together with them. He did not want to live in the king's house and do wrong things. He would only be happy for a short time there.
korean_text: 도리어 하나님의 백성과 함께 고난 받기를 잠시 죄악의 낙을 누리는 것보다 더 좋아하고

sentences.original_text: Instead, Moses chose to join with God's people.
sentences.korean_translation: 대신 모세는 하나님의 백성과 함께하기를 선택했습니다.

sentences.original_text: He chose to receive trouble and pain
He did not want to live in the king's house
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 왕의 집에서 살기를 원하지 않았습니다.
그리고 잘못된 일을 하는 것을 원하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: He would only be happy for a short time there.
